name: Screw This Thing!
description:
Screw This Thing! is a game about tapping out your frustrations on everyday objects until you flick them into infinity! A mobile "clicker" with 15 levels to complete and many laughs to be had.

Designed by:

  • Connor Botts - Programming
  • Alex Diorio - Voice Acting
  • Ethan Thibault - Sound Engineering

Art by:

  • Denys Almaral - Trump
  • Delton Hulbert - Everything Else
